quotes.quote: You look like you live with your mother!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: If you know what happened in the Mets game don't tell me, I taped it. Hello?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You done with this?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: This dictionary's no good, we need a medical dictionary! When a patient is difficult, you quone him.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Kramerica Industries!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You made a man cry? I've never made a man cry. I even kicked a guy in the groin once and he didn't cry.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: What do you think a hit man would charge..to rub out a couple of cats?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: You should do it like a band-aid -- one motion, RIGHT OFF!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Levels Jerry..levels. --  I'm getting rid of all my furniture. All of it. And I'm going to build these different levels, with steps, and it'll all be carpeted with a lot of pillows. You know, like ancient Egypt.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I hate anyone who ever had a pony growing up!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I cannot envision any circumstance in which I'll ever have the opportunity to have sex again. How's it gonna happen? I just don't see how it could occur.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Can you do me a solid!?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: We had a funny guy with us in Korea. A tailgunner. They blew his brains out all over the Pacific. ... There's nothing funny about that.
quotes.author: Alton Benes(Elaines Father)

quotes.quote: Women don't want to see need. They want a take-charge guy. A colonel, a kaiser, a czar!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Please, don't insult me -- no one's a bigger idiot than me.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I lie every second of the day. My whole life is a sham.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: People don't turn down money, it's what separates us from the animals!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: So please, a little respect ... for I am Costanza -- Lord of the idiots!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: It was the single most damaging experience of my life -- aside from seeing my father naked
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I say we 'get' him
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You're in big trouble son. Burglary, grand larceny, possession of stolen goods.. and uh, uh.. murder!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: C'mon what's the big deal... just gonna put a little concrete in the washing machine
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Oh yeah I usually sit around naked a couple hours a day. I cook naked, I clean naked, I drive naked, naked, naked, naked!
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Women go after doctors like men go after models -- They want someone with knowledge of the body. We just want the body
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: The really bad thing about the heart is the sex thing. See, you gotta be careful about sex now. You get that heart pumping and suddenly, boom! Next thing you know, you got a hose coming out of your chest attached to a piece of luggage!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Oh yeah? My friend, Bob Saccomanno, he came in here for a hernia operation.. Oh yeah, routine surgery.. now he's sittin' around in a chair by a window going - 'My name is Bob!'
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I completely skipped healthy adulthood. I went from having orgasms immediately to taking forever. You could do your taxes in the time it takes me to have an orgasm.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I'm an eggplant! I'm an eggplant! I'm a minstrel man!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Now you listen to me. I want details and I want them right now. I don't have a job, I have no place to go. You're not in the mood? Well you get in the mood!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Look, will you at least let me bring the guy over? He's an amazing man -- He's a Russian immigrant. He escaped the Gulag! He's like the Sakharov of cable guys.. He'll slow down your gas meter.. He sells slugs! -- Jerry. Slugs for the subway!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: My name is Bill.. You might be the last person I ever see
quotes.author: Bill

quotes.quote: Yeah I eat the whole apple.. core, stem, seeds -- everything
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You ever eat the bark off of a pineapple?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You walk over that table, you pick up an eggroll, you don't say anything, you eat it, say 'thank you very much', wipe your mouth, walk away- I give you 50 bucks.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Movie hotdogs! I'd rather lick the food off the floor!
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: I don't know him! -- He could be one of those people who walks around the street pricking people with pins!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Well...... its been a week, its up to the cat now.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Three nights ago, a gas main beneath the restaurant exploded, killing five people in my section, including the busboy who replaced me. If I am not fired that night because of you and your thoughtless, stupid, insensitive remarks, it would have been me. You saved my life!
quotes.author: Antonio(The Busboy)

quotes.quote: Are you crazy?! -- I can't have a man touching me!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You know my feelings on this-- I don't even pay taxes!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Kramer..saw me naked.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: My whole life has been a complete waste of time... and there's so much more to go.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: It's the financial equivalent of a complete rectal examination.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I've driven women to lesbianism before, but never a mental institution.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Stella!!!
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: It's one day. Half a day, really. I mean you substract showers and meals, it's like twenty minutes.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Two-hundred seats on a plane and I gotta wind up next to Yukon Jack and his dog Cujo!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I believe I referred to her personality as a potential science exhibit.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: I wanted to talk about how we had nothing to talk about.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: The library investigator's name is actually Bookman? -- That's amazing. That's like an ice cream man named Cone.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Let me tell you something, funny boy... You know that little stamp? The one that says New York Public Library? Well, that may not mean anything to you, but that means a lot to me. One whole helluva lot. Sure, go ahead, laugh if you want to. I've seen your type before -- flashy, making the scene, flaunting convention. Yeah, I know what you're thinking... Why's this guy making such a big stink about old library books? Let me give you a hint, junior. Maybe we can live without libraries, people like you and me.... Maybe. Sure, we're too old to change the world. What about that kid, sitting down, opening a book right now in a branch of the local library and finding pictures of pee-pees and wee-wees in The Cat in the Hat and The Five Chinese Brothers. Doesn't he deserve better? Look, if you think this is about overdue fines and missing books, you'd better think again. This is about that kid's right to read a book without getting his mind warped. Or maybe that turns you on, Seinfeld... Maybe that's how you get your kicks... You and your goodtime buddies... I've got a flash for you, joy boy. Partytime is over.
quotes.author: Lt. Bookman

quotes.quote: You'd better not screw up again, Seinfeld, because if you do, I'll be all over you like a pitbull on a poodle.
quotes.author: Lt. Bookman

quotes.quote: If I am not in front of my building at 6:15 when my parents get there, they are going to put me on an aggravation installment plan that will compound with interest for decades.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You know, I've been issued a public urination pass by the city because of my condition. Unfortunately, my little brother ran out of the house with it this morning. Him and his friends are probably peeing all over the place.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I can't carry a pen. I'm afraid I'll puncture my scrotum.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: She thinks I'm a nice guy. Women always think I'm nice. But women don't want nice.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Hey, do me a favor. If some guy comes around looking for me, tell him you don't know where I am.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You should've seen her face. It was the exact same look my father gave me when I told him I wanted to be a ventriloquist.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You know what that makes you? A baldist.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You stink!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: How often do you cut your toenails?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Well, you're just as pretty as any of them. You just need a nose job.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I have never been so repulsed by someone mentally and so attracted to them physically at the same time. It's like my brain is facing my penis in a chess game. And I'm letting him win.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Maybe the dingo ate your baby.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: I don't like when a woman says, 'Make love to me', it's intimidating. The last time a woman said that to me, I wound up apologizing to her.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: What could possess anyone to throw a party?  I mean, to have a bunch of strangers treat your house like a hotel room.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: These pretzels are making me thirsty.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Moving cars from one side of the street to the other don't take no more sense than puttin' on a pair of pants. My question to you is: who's puttin' your pants on?
quotes.author: Sid

quotes.quote: Can you die from an odor?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: I see a very cheap man holding a sweater trying to get away with something.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I don't know if it was the alcohol or the ammonia, but the next thing I knew she was mopping the floor with me.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You had sex on your desk with the cleaning woman.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Elaine you don't understand. I had 103 temperature when I bought that sweater. I was so dizzy I was seeing red dots everywhere. I thought everything in the store had a red dot on it. I couldn't distinguish one red dot from another. I couldn't afford anything. I have nothing. I haven't worked for a really long time. I mean look, I have no clothes, look at what I'm wearing. It's just a little red dot.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I always get the feeling that when lesbians look at me, they're thinking, 'That's why I'm not a heterosexual.'
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Big brokerage houses killed my father.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I'm not a lesbian. I hate men, but I'm not a lesbian!
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: His mother was a mudder... His father was a mudder.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: We all want the hand. Hand is tough to get.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Anyone who would laugh at a recital is probably some sort of lunatic anyway. I mean, only a sick, twisted mind could be that rude and ignorant.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I don't have a good apartment for an intervention. The furniture, it's very non-confrontational.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: A plane crash? A heart attack? Lupus? Is it lupus?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You can say what you want about me, but I'll be damned if I'm going to stand here while you insult my toothbrush.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: The carpet sweeper is the biggest scam perpetrated on the American public since one-hour martinizing.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: The guy is unconscious in a coma and you don't have the guts to kiss his girlfriend?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: My boys can swim!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You wouldn't know it to look at him, but George can bait a hook.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: What am I, a hooker?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: It's hard enough to meet a woman you dislike, much less like.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I would really like to have sex with a tall woman.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Vandelay! Say Vandelay!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: So Biff wants to be a buff? Well, sleeping less than eighteen hours a day would be a start.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Hello, Ma? It's me. Guess where I am? In the back of a limo. No, nobody died. It's a long story, I can't tell you now. Because I can't. I said I can't. If I could, I would. Would you stop it. All right, look, I'm getting off. No, I'm not telling you. How's this - I'm never telling you. I don't care. No. Fine. Never!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I know Jerry. He's not a Nazi. No. He's just neat.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: If you want to make a person feel better after they sneeze, you shouldn't say 'God bless you.' You should say 'You're so good looking!'
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You know they're mentally disturbed. They should be sent to Australia.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Hey buddy, where's my thank you wave?!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I like the button fly. That is one place on my wardrobe I do not need sharp interlocking metal teeth. It's a mink trap down there.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: The appeal of the posse? Posse has tremendous appeal. Get away from the job, you camp out, you're with friends. I mean, come on, it's a week-long game of hide-and-go-seek on horseback.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I see a parasite. A sexually depraved miscreant who is seeking only to gratify his basest and most immediate urges.
quotes.author: Old Man Looking At Painting Of Kramer

quotes.quote: All bald people look good in hats.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You don't understand. A garage... I can't even pull in there. It's like going to a prostitute. Why should I pay, when if I apply myself, maybe I could get it for free?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You want to know why you can't go in front first? I'll tell you why. Because it signals a breakdown in the social order. Chaos. It reduces us to jungle law.
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: I'm like ice, buddy. When I don't like you, you've got problems.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Do you ever yearn?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Having the keys to Jerry's apartment - that kept me in a fantasy world. Every time I went over to his house it was like a vacation: better food, better view, better TV, cleaner, oh, *much* cleaner. That became my reality. I ignored the squalor in my own life because I'm looking at life, you see, through Jerry's eyes. I was living in the twilight, living in the shadows, living in the darkness... like you.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: What do you think Junior? You think these hands - they've been soaking in Ivory Liquid?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: My personal acting technique is working with color. Imagining, then finding the emotional vibrational mood connected to the color. See, if you look through my scripts, you see that all my lines have a special color. So, I don't memorize language, I memorize colors. This way I can go through red, yellow, green, blue, and you have a full palette of emotions.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Seemingly, but within that basic framework there are many subtle variations only discernible to an acute observer that reflect the many moods, the many shades, the many sides of George Costanza.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Hello, 911? How are ya?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Artistic integrity. Where did you come up with that? You're not artistic and you have no integrity.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Salsa is now the number one condiment in America.Do you know why? Because people like to say 'Salsa!'
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Yo-Yo Ma!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You wouldn't be here if it wasn't for me and my helmet. I saved your life! You would be dead! Dead! You would cease to exist! You would be gone for the rest of eternity! You wouldn't even begin to comprehend what that means!
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: Yes, I admit I was speeding, but it was to save a man's life. A close friend. An innocent person who wanted nothing more out of life than to love, to be loved, and to be a banker.
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: You know, a muffin can be very filling!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Why would I be insulted? I'm never insulted. You could call me baldy, dump soup on my head. Nothing insults me.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Have we been intimate?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Don't tell me about business! I sold raincoats for thirty-five years!
quotes.author: Morty

quotes.quote: Let me see if I understand this. In other words, you held out for... less money.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: My cubans!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: What are you looking at? You never seen a kid in a bubble before?
quotes.author: The Bubble Boy

quotes.quote: It's very hard being a stand-up comedian. Sometimes they don't laugh!
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: It's crowded, the grass has big brown patches in it, they don't rake the sand traps. Not to mention the caliber of people you have to play with!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I have tremendous respect for people who work with feet. I mean, to dedicate yourself to the foot... You're toiling in virtual anonymity.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Jerry, Joe Davola. I have a hair on my tongue. Can't get it off. You know how much I hate that? Of course you do. You put it there. I know what you said about me, Seinfeld. I know you badmouthed me to the execs at NBC. Put the kibosh on my deal. Now I'm gonna put the kibosh on you. You know I've kiboshed before. And I will kibosh again.
quotes.author: Joe Davola

quotes.quote: But officer, he threatened me. I don't understand, that's not right. What if it was the President of the United States, I bet you'd investigate. Well, so what? What's the difference? I'm a comedian of the United States. And I'll tell you, I'm under just as much pressure.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You know, it is so sad. All your knowledge of high culture comes from Bugs Bunny cartoons.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: I don't want to be remembered. I want to be forgotten.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: This whole sex thing is totally overrated. Now, the one thing you gotta be ready for is how the man changes into a completely different person five seconds after it's over. I mean, something happens to their personality. It's really quite astounding. It's like they committed a crime and they want to flee the scene before the police get there.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: I can't take it any more! She's drivin' me crazy. I can't sleep, I can't leave the house. When I'm here I'm climbin' the walls. Meanwhile I'm datin' a virgin, I'm in this contest... something's gotta give!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Too bad you couldn't do *that* for a living... You'd be very successful at it. You could sell out Madison Square Garden. Thousands of people could watch you. You could be a big star!
quotes.author: George's Mom

quotes.quote: I hate rental cars. Nothing ever works: the window doesn't work, the radio doesn't work... and it smells like a cheap hooker.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You see? Never be late for a plane with a girl. 'Cuz a girl runs like a girl-- with the little steps and the arms flailing out... You wanna make this plane, you've gotta run like a man! Get your knees up!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Look at you! You run like a girl! Run like a man! Lift your knees!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You *cannot* abandon people in the middle of an airport pickup! It's a binding social contract. We must go forward, not back.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I could have been a millionaire!! I could have been a FRAGRANCE millionaire!!!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: That's the true spirit of Christmas; people being helped by people other than me.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: A pretty woman, you know, kinda short, big wall of hair, face like a frying pan.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: A short guy with glasses, looked like Humpty Dumpty with a melon head.
quotes.author: Ticket Lady(Describing George)

quotes.quote: A guy who's about five foot eleven, he's got uh, a big head and flared nostrils.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Men can sit through the most pointless, boring movie if there's even the slightest possibility that a woman will take her top off.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Kramer goes to a fantasy camp. His whole life is a fantasy camp. People should plunk down two-thousand dollars to live like him for a week. Do nothing, fall ass-backwards into money, mooch food off your neighbors, and have sex without dating. *That's* a fantasy camp!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Would it kill you not to be so funny all the time? That's all I'm askin'. This woman thinks I'm very funny and now you're gonna be funny, so what am I gonna be? I'm gonna be a short bald guy with glasses who suddenly doesn't seem so funny.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Well, birthdays are merely symbolic of how another year's gone by and how little we've grown. No matter how desperate we are that someday a better self will emerge, each flicker of the candles on the cake we know it's not to be. That for the rest of our sad, wretched, pathetic lives, this is who we are to the bitter end. Inevitably, irrevocably. Happy birthday? No such thing.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You bad man! You very bad man! You very lazy bad man!!
quotes.author: Babu

quotes.quote: I am going to save up every rupee. For someday, I will get back to America, and when I do, I will exact vengeance on this man. I cannot forget it. He haunts me. He is a very bad man. Very, very bad man.
quotes.author: Babu

quotes.quote: Divorce is very difficult, especially on the kids. Of course, I'm the result of my parents having stayed together, so you never know.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Looking at cleavage is like looking at the sun. You don't stare at it. It's too risky. You get a sense of it and then you look away.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Not that there's anything wrong with that!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Yeah. I'm Buck Naked.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Every day it's something else with you. I don't know anything about you any more. Who are you? What kind of life are you leading? Who knows what you're doing? Maybe you're making porno films.
quotes.author: George's Mother

quotes.quote: Oh, what's the point? When I like them, they don't like me, when they like me, I don't like them. Why can't I act with the ones I like the same way I do with the ones I don't like?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Yeah, I'm a great quitter. It's one of the few things I do well. I come from a long line of quitters. My father was a quitter, my grandfather was a quitter... I was raised to give up.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I would like to dip my bald head in oil and rub it all over your body.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Because the mail never stops. It just keeps coming and coming and coming, there's never a let-up. It's relentless. Every day it piles up more and more and more! And you gotta get it out but the more you get it out the more it keeps coming in. And then the bar code reader breaks and it's Publisher's Clearing House day!
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: Why would I be a leg man? I don't need legs. I have legs.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: In the whole world right now there's maybe three emergencies. Why would you think on this entire planet that you're one of those three?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Sometimes when I think you're the shallowest man I've ever met, you somehow manage to drain a little more out of the pool.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Who's gonna turn down a Junior Mint? It's chocolate, it's peppermint -- it's delicious!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Produce section. Very provocative area. A lot of melons and shapes. Everyone's squeezing and smelling...
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Y'know, the funny thing is, somehow I find her more appealing now... It's like if I knew she was a lesbian when we went out, I never would've broken up with her.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You don't understand what I'm up against. This is a force more powerful than anything you can imagine. Even Superman would be helpless against this kind of stench.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Amazing! I drive them to lesbianism, and he brings 'em back!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: First he vomits on me. Then he burns down my father's cabin. And now he's taken Mona away from me.
quotes.author: Susan

quotes.quote: Is it my imagination, or do really good-looking women walk a lot faster than everybody else?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Isosceles. You know, I love the name Isosceles. If I had a kid, I would name him Isosceles. Isosceles Kramer.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: This is our best model, the Cougar 9000. It's the Rolls Royce of wheelchairs. This is like, you're almost glad to be handicapped.
quotes.author: Wheelchair Salesman

quotes.quote: Am I a hipster-doofus?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You know the message you're sending out to the world with these sweatpants? You're telling the world, 'I give up. I can't compete in normal society. I'm miserable, so I might as well be comfortable.'
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I want to be the one person who doesn't die with dignity.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: How'd you like it if I just pulled your heart out of your chest right now and shoved it down your throat?
quotes.author: TV Kramer (to George)

quotes.quote: How could anyone not like him?
quotes.author: Jerry's Mom

quotes.quote: The woman had an orgasm under false pretenses. That's sexual perjury!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: This peach is sub-par.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: They don't have a decent piece of fruit at the supermarket. The apples are mealy, the oranges are dry... I don't know what's going on with the papayas!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Borrowing money from a friend is like having sex. It just completely changes the relationship.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Oh, those are nice. Ya know, I never noticed this before. They're smooth, creamy, delicate, yet masculine.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I don't know what to believe. You're eatin' onions, you're spottin' dimes, I don't know what the hell is going on!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: It's a Commando-8, 12,000 BTU's. It's gonna be like a meat locker in here!
quotes.author: Jerry's Mom

quotes.quote: Retail is for suckers.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Oh yeah, I've been known to drink a beer or two, but then again, I've been known to do a lot of things.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Here's to feeling good all the time.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Hey, I'm telling you, the pig-man is alive. The government has been experimenting with pig-men since the 50's.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I wish there were pig-men. You get a few of those pig-men walking around, suddenly I'm looking a lot better. That way if someone wanted to fix me up they could say, 'Hey, at least he's no pig-man.'
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You remember this: When you control the mail, you control information!
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: How about six? Six is good. You got a problem with six?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You don't eat Oreos? The way you break 'em open and.... It's like you're having sex with 'em.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You know what I would do if I was running for mayor? One of my campaign themes would be that everybody should wear nametags all the time to make the city friendlier.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: My whole life is a lie.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I could raise enough money to cure polio.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Well, a lot of people consider me small and prestigious.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I show up! I pretend I have the job. The guy's on vacation. If I have the job, it's fine. If I don't have the job, by the time he comes back I'm ensconced.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I haven't vomited in thirteen years.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: This woman hates me so much, I'm starting to like her.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Hey! I am looser than creamed corn.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Hey, you know what would make a great coffee table book? A coffee table book about coffee tables!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Ya know, I don't get it. I'm not allowed to ask a Chinese person where a Chinese restaurant is? I mean, aren't we all getting a little too sensitive? I mean, somebody asks me which way is Israel, I don't fly off the handle.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I canâ€™t believe how easy it is. Iâ€™m virtually Orthodox. All I have to do is read a few books, memorize a few prayers, and Iâ€™m in the club.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: She told me. She said sheâ€™s never had a man stir up all of these feelings inside of her. Sheâ€™s questioning her faith. Sheâ€™s thinking of leaving the church. Oh, uh, this power. Iâ€™m dangerous Jerry, Iâ€™m very very dangerous!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Elaine, he's a male bimbo. He's a mimbo!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: It's a different world when you're with a cool guy.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: No, I don't have a square to spare. I can't spare a square.
quotes.author: Jane

quotes.quote: The key to eating a black and white cookie, Elaine, is you want to get some black and some white in each bite. Nothing mixes better than vanilla and chocolate. And yet, still, somehow racial harmony eludes us. If people would only look to the cookie. All our problems would be solved.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Nobody takes better care of their hair than me. You can serve dinner on my head.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Why couldn't you make me an architect? You know I always wanted to pretend that I was an architect.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: So I started to walk into the water. I won't lie to you boys, I was terrified. But I pressed on, and as I made my way past the breakers a strange calm came over me. I don't know if it was divine intervention or the kinship of all living things, but I tell you Jerry, at that moment I was a marine biologist.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: The sea was angry that day, my friends, like an old man trying to send back soup in a deli.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: This woman is bending my mind into a pretzel.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Did you just roll your eyes at him? Because let me tell you something. If anybody should be rolling their eyes, it is me, at him, about you.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: If I was a woman I'd be down on the dock waiting for the fleet to come in.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I spend so much time trying to get their clothes off, I never thought of taking mine off.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You know, George, they're doing wonderful things at mental institutions these days. I'd be happy to set up a meet and greet.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I'm really enjoying this marriage thing. You think about each other, you care about each other. It's wonderful. Plus, I love saying 'my wife'. Once I started saying it, I couldn't stop. 'My wife' this, 'My wife' that. It's an amazing way to begin a sentence.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I guess I just wasn't ready for the responsibilities of a pretend-marriage.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Hey, believe me, baldness will catch on. When the aliens come, who do you think they're gonna relate to? Who do you think's gonna be the first ones getting a tour of the ship?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Booing and hissing are not part of the show. You boo puppets. You hiss villains in silent movies.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote:
"After he heckled Toby, she got so upset she ran out of the building and a street sweeper ran over her foot and severed her pinky-toe."
"That's unbelievable!"
"Yeah, then after the ambulance left, I found the toe. So, I put it in a Cracker Jack box, filled it with ice and took off for the hospital."
"You ran?"
"No, I jumped on the bus. I told the driver, 'I got a toe here buddy. Step on it!'"
"Holy cow!"
"Yeah yeah, then all of a sudden this guy pulls out a gun. Well, I knew any delay's gonna cost her her pinky-toe, so I got out of the seat and I started walking towards him. He says, 'Where do you think you're going, Cracker Jack?' I says, 'Well, I got a little prize for you, buddy.' Pwaa! Pwaa! Keeyah! Knocked him out cold!"
"How could you do that?"
"Yeah, then everybody is screaming because the driver, he's passed out because of all the commotion. The bus is out of control! So I grab him by the collar, I take him out of the seat, I get behind the wheel... Now I'm driving the bus!"
"You're Batman."
"Yeah, I am Batman. Then the mugger, he comes to and he starts choking me. So, I'm fighting him off with one hand and I kept driving the bus with the other. Then I managed to open up the door and I kicked him out the door with my foot at the next stop."
"You kept making all the stops?"
"Well, people kept ringing the bell!"
"What about the toe? What happened to the toe?"
"Well, I am happy to say that the little guy is back in place at the end of the line."
"You did all this for a pinky-toe?"
"Well, it's a valuable appendage."
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Is it me, or was that the ugliest baby you have ever seen?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Like when a man goes swimming... Afterwards...
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Look, you don't understand. There was shrinkage.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Elaine, don't get too down. Everything will even out. See, I have two friends. You were up, he was down. Now he's up, you're down. You see how it all evens out for me?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I'm the opposite of every guy you've ever met.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Bald men with no jobs and no money who live with their parents don't approach strange women.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: These doves were murdered.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Oh. I'm watching my height. My doctor doesn't want me to get any taller.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Generally speaking, you don't need any extra incentive to murder a dry cleaner.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Newman never stops seeing anybody. Newman will see whoever is willing to see him.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: "Maybe he's an enigma, a mystery wrapped in a riddle." "He's a mystery wrapped in a Twinkie."
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Where are the totebags? I'm not leaving the premises without totebags. I was promised totebags and totebags I shall have.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I saw someone on the street eating M&M's with a spoon.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: If I like their race, how can that be racist?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I'm out there Jerry and loving every minute of it.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: It's a shame his parents didn't get divorced thirty years ago. He could've been normal.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I need the secure packaging of Jockeys. My boys need a house!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: The only thing between him and us is a thin layer of gaberdine.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You know what I love? How there's two nuts named after people: Hazel and Filbert.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: So let me get this straight. You find yourself in the kitchen, you see an eclair in the receptacle, and you think to yourself, 'What the hell, I'll just eat some trash.'
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: But I'm afraid of clowns.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: "I'm better with the mothers than I am with the daughters." "Maybe you should date the mothers." "If I could talk to the mothers and have sex with the daughters, then I'd really have something going."
quotes.author: George and Jerry

quotes.quote: Horse manure's not that bad. I don't even mind the word manure. It's newer, which is good, and a ma in front of it. Ma-Newer. When you consider the other choices, manure is actually pretty refreshing.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I really like depriving myself of things. It's fun! Very monastic.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: What's so great about a mom and pop store? Let me tell you something, if my mom and pop ran a store I wouldn't shop there.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: For all I know, this guy went out of his way to not invite you. How am I going to feel if I show up with an uninvited, unwelcome intruder?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I would give up red meat just to get a glimpse of you in a bra.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Yes, this is a business office, but I'm not a businessman per se. I'm here working for the people. I'm causing dissent, stirring the pot, getting people to question the whole rotten system.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Fine, you want to be a communist, be a communist. Can't you at least look like a successful communist?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: All my life I've been running away from that name. That's why I wouldn't tell anybody. But I've been thinking about it. All this time I'm trying not to be me. I'm afraid to face who I was. But I'm Cosmo, Jerry, I'm Cosmo Kramer, and that's who I'm going to be. From now on, I'm Cosmo!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Do you ever just get down on your knees and thank God that you know me and have access to my dementia?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: The jokes kept bouncing off her like Superman.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I would drape myself in velvet if it were socially acceptable.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Alright, fine, you sit there and you watch while Newman takes over the world. But he'd be a horrible leader. And you know who's going to suffer? The little people. You and George.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I don't trust this guy. I think he re-gifted, and then he de-gifted, and now he's using an upstairs invite as a springboard to a Super Bowl sex romp.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You know what the Ukraine is? It's a sitting duck. A road apple, Newman. The Ukraine is weak. It's feeble. I think it's time to put the hurt on the Ukraine.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote:
"What's this?
			"It's an eyepatch."
			"You look like a pirate."
			"I want to be a pirate
quotes.author: Kramer and Jerry

quotes.quote: When someone is lying, is it true that their pants are actually on fire?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I feel like my old self again... Totally inadequate, completely insecure, paranoid, neurotic... It's a pleasure.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I got rejected by a bald woman.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Well, frankly, outside of a sexual relationship, I don't see the point to it. I'm not thrilled with all the handshaking either, but one step at a time.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: No, no, a bra is for ladies. Meet the Bro!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote:
"Bro's no good. Too ethnic."
			"You got something better?"
			"How about the Mansiere?"
			"Mansiere."
			"That's right. A brassiere for a man."
quotes.author: Kramer and Frank Costanza

quotes.quote: He's a comedian, Mrs. Payton. They don't know how to do anything.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Say you're getting intimate with a woman, you don't want her fumbling and struggling back there. I think we've all experienced that.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: It's like having a circus in my mouth.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: See, the thing of it is, there's a lot of ugly people out there walking around but they don't know they're ugly because nobody actually tells them.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I'm grotesque. I look like a troll.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: All those mechanics do is work all day with their hands and their big muscular arms on machines and then they come home dripping with animal sexuality like Stanley Kowalski. What a huge turn-off that is.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: We were in the garage. You know how garages are. They're conducive to sex talk. It's a high testosterone area.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I'm Cosmo Kramer, the Assman!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Have you ever met a proctologist? They usually have a very good sense of humor. You meet a proctologist at a party, don't walk away. Plant yourself there because you will hear the funniest stories you've ever heard. See, no one wants to admit to them that they stuck something up there. Never. It's always an accident. Every proctologist story ends in the same way... 'It was a million to one shot, doc, million to one.'
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I'm Cosmo Kramer, the Assman!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Jerry? Yes, I suppose he is white. You know, I never really thought about it. I don't see people in terms of color. You know, there's someone I'd like you to meet. Hand on... (To phone) Is Mr. Morgan in?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Yeah, but before I met up with her, I stopped to look at the monkeys, when all of a sudden I am hit in the face with a banana peel. I turn and look and there is this monkey really laughing it up. Then someone tells me that he did it. Well, I pick up the banana peel and I wait for that monkey to turn around. And then I *whap* let him have it.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Kramer, you threw a banana peel at a monkey?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Yeah, white meat. And if I see one piece of dark meat on there. It's your ass buster.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I'm much more comfortable criticizing people behind their backs.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: It can never be erased. It'll follow us wherever we go for the rest of our lives. I'll never be able to get a job. I mean, doesn't that concern you? Everything I've worked for...down the drain because of one stupid mistake. I mean, aren't we entitled to make one mistake in our lives, Jerry?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: In your situation the only sex you're going to have better than make-up sex is if you're sent to prison and you have a conjugal visit.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Yeah that's going to be a problem. It's gonna be a problem for them. This a clear violation of your rights as a consumer. It's an infringement on your constitutional rights. It's outrageous, egregious, preposterous.
quotes.author: Jackie

quotes.quote: You put the balm on? Who told you to put the balm on? I didn't tell you to put the balm on. Why'd  you put the balm on? You haven't even been to see the doctor. If your gonna put a balm on, let a doctor put a balm on.
quotes.author: Jackie

quotes.quote: I'd rather be dating the blind. You know, you could let the house go. You could let yourself go. A good looking blind woman doesn't even know you're not good enough for her.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: So, what you are saying is that ninety to ninety-five percent of the population is undateable?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Women don't respect salad eaters.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: When you look annoyed all the time, people think that you're busy.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I'm not taking a soak in that human bacteria vat you got goin' there.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: We all get a little cuckoo sometimes, George. I used to be like you. Berating personnel until they cried, calling managers on the field during a game, threatening to move the team to New Jersey, just to upset people. Then I found a way to relax. I've got two words to say to you, George... Hot Tub!
quotes.author: George Steinbrenner

quotes.quote: You can't eat this soup standing up, your knees buckle.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: The guy who runs the place is a little temperamental, especially about the ordering procedure. He's secretly referred to as the Soup Nazi.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: No soup for you!
quotes.author: The Soup Nazi

quotes.quote: He's not a Nazi. He just happens to be a little eccentric. Most geniuses are.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: So, essentially, you chose soup over a woman?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: You're through, Soup Nazi. Pack it up. No more soup for you. Next!
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: If you're in some situation where some fast cash will save your life, I'll give you the code.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: There's nothing more pathetic than a grown man who's afraid of a woman.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote:
"You have no idea of the magnitude of this thing. If she is allowed to infiltrate this world then George Costanza as you know him ceases to exist. You see, right now I have Relationship George. But there is also Independent George. That's the George you know, the George you grew up with... Movie George, Coffee Shop George, Liar George, Bawdy George."
"I love that George." "Me too, and he's dying. If Relationship George walks through this door, he will kill Independent George. A George divided against itself cannot stand!"
quotes.author: George and Jerry

quotes.quote: This is totally different! That was my secret, this is Jerry's secret! There's...there's attorney-client priveleges here! If I play it by your rule, no one'll ever confide in me again, I'll be cut out of the loop!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Well, you know, I was thinking about what you said before, and...you're right, I've never really been a couple, so...if that's the rule, then I'm gonna go by the rule.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Elaine...let me just explain something to you. See, this is not just a weekend routine...I'm on the verge of make-up sex here. You know about make-up sex?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I mean, she's giving and caring and genuinely concerned about the welfare of others - I can't be with someone like that!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Yeah, it was, but then I just couldn't decide if he was really sponge-worthy.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Now see, this is what the holidays are all about. Three buddies sitting around, chewing gum.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I think I finally figured out what the flavor is in this gum. It's a little lo-meiny.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Well, why go to a fine restaurant when you could just stick something in the microwave... Why go to the park and fly a kite when you could just pop a pill?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I don't want John thinking that I'm hot and heavy if he's not hot and heavy. I'm trying to get a little squirrel to come over to me here. I don't want to make any big sudden movements. I'll frighten him away.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Let me understand. You've got the hen, the chicken and the rooster. The rooster goes with the chicken. So, who's having sex with the hen?
quotes.author: Frank Costanza

quotes.quote: This woman has never, not once, ever, as long as I've known her, worn a bra.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Have I ever bought you a jockstrap as a gift?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: A woman just walking around in broad daylight with nothing but a bra on? She's a menace to society.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: It's lewd, lascivious, salacious, outrageous!
quotes.author: Jackie

quotes.quote: I miss the days when they made toys that could kill a kid.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Well, I was under the impression that I could take anything I wanted from your fridge, and you could take whatever you want from mine.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: A wise man once taught me the healing power of the body's natural pressure points. He sells t-shirts outside the World Trade Center.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I don't think I can talk to you any more. I feel inferior.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I have never been anyone's type, but apparently, this Marisa Tomei loves funny, quirky, bald men.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: I'm not force-feeding myself a steak at four-thirty to save a couple of bucks, I'll tell you that!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Low flow? I don't like the sound of that.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: If I don't have a good shower, I am not myself. I feel weak and ineffectual. I'm not Kramer.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: It's disgusting. I'm sitting there in a tepid pool of my own filth. All kinds of microscopic parasites and organisms having sex all around me.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Look at you, you're disgusting. You're bald, you're paunchy. All kinds of sounds are emanating from your body twenty-four hours a day. If there's a woman that can take your presence for more than ten consecutive seconds, you should hang on to her like grim death... which is not far off by the way.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Now this is remarkable. I'm lounging, and yet, my pants remain perfectly creased.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Oh, I'm percolating, Jerry. I'm telling you, I have never felt so fertile. I'm mossy, Jerry. My brain is mossy. Listen to this idea. A restaurant that serves only peanut butter and jelly.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I don't know! (building to a shout) But I woke up in the Hudson river in a SACK!! I think she drugged me, but she's a murderer and I'm calling the cops.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Well Bob Sacamano, he stayed with me once for a year and a half.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: It's been known to happen....... telling you right now Elaine, this guy 's gonna dangle that dress in front of you like a dirt farmer dangles a carrot in front of a mule.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I'M NOT A PIMP.!!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I am never putting on another piece of clothing unless it's straight out of the dryer.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Let me be perfectly blunt. I don't care for you, Costanza. You hang out on the west side of the building with Seinfeld all day laughing it up, wasting your lives.
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: You've got your shirt in my oven?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Hey. You put your groceries under the hood of my car?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: A mechanic forms an emotional attachment, thinks he's gonna lose the car, he panics, he does something rash. I'm gonna ask you somepersonal questions. I'm sorry if I touch a nerve, but I think it'll help with the case. Had you been taking good care of the car?
quotes.author: The Detective(After Jerry's mechanic steals his car.)

quotes.quote: Yeah, don't worry Jerry. We're right on this guy like stink on a monkey! I'll check back with you.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Ah, look, I..I'm sorry to bother you, but I'm a US postal worker and my mail truck was just ambushed by a band of backwoods mail-hating survivalists.
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: I can't get my pants off, and Mickey's audition is in twenty minutes! You know, I'm supposed to be a business man, I gotta be in costume!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Hey!! Buddy. I thought of a great invention for driving. A periscope in a car, so you can see the traffic.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I was free and clear. I was living the dream. I was stripped to the waist eating a block of cheese the size of a car battery.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Between you and me, I always thought Kramer was a bit of a doofus. But, he believed in me. You did not. So, as I see it, he's not the doofus. You are the doofus.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Oh, she's uh...she's real. She can bring home the bacon and fry it in the pan.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: George, Quinn here was moving a chair...he lost his balance and dropped it...it must have fallen on your briefcase, which, for some reason, contained a running tape recorder?
quotes.author: Wyck

quotes.quote: I can't spend the rest of my life coming into this stinking apartment every ten minutes to pore over the excruciating minutia of every single daily event.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: She had man-hands!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Women like that are like members of a secret tribe living in a forbidden city. People like me have not been inside in thousands of years.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You know what they say, 'You don't sell the steak, you sell the sizzle.'
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I could drop you like a bag of dirt.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: He wrote the check and I cashed it.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: It's more like a full-body dry heave set to music.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Who's going to bomb you? An airline? For all the stupid little peanut jokes?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You don't even know what a write-off is.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You know what? I can't do this. I can't read books anymore; books on tape have ruined me, Jerry. I need that nice voice. This book has *my* voice. I hate my voice.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Well I also dropped it on the way over. Look I'm in trouble, I got no skills. I can't peel, I can't chop, I can't grate. I can't mince! I got no sense of flavor, obviously. You know, I gotta talk to Frank.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Why do they call it Ovaltine? The mug is round. The jar is round. They should call it round tine. That's gold, Jerry! Gold!
quotes.author: Banya

quotes.quote: Here you're just another apple. But in Japan, you're an erotic fruit. Like an orange, which is rare there.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: So you're angry that this bizarre carpet cabal made no attempt to abduct you?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I'm like a commercial jingle. First it's a little irritating. Then you hear it a few times. You're humming it in the shower. By the third date, it's 'Buy Mennen!'
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: The greasy doorknob, the constant licking of the fingers. He's hooked on this chicken, isn't he?
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Newman, you wouldn't eat broccoli if it was deep-fried in chocolate sauce.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I can do six weeks standing on my head. I'm a sexual camel.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: To a woman, sex is like the garbage man. You just take for granted the fact that any time you put some trash out on the street, a guy in a jumpsuit's gonna come along and pick it up. But now, it's like a garbage strike. The bags are piling up in your head. The sidewalk is blocked. Nothing's getting through. You're stupid.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: This is the most public yet of my many humiliations.
quotes.author: Jackie Chiles

quotes.quote: Guys, hitting is not about muscle. It's simple physics. Calculate the velocity, v, in relation to the trajectory, t, in which g, gravity, of course remains a constant. It's not complicated.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Newman is my sworn enemy. And he lives down the hall from my home. My home, Elaine! Where I sleep, where I come to play with my toys.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: A bird ran into my giant freak-head.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: I couldn't get there in time to stop it, but you should have seen Little Jerry, Jerry! Flappin' his wings and struttin' his stuff! He was peckin' and weavin' and bobbin' and talkin' trash! He didn't even have to touch him! The other rooster ran out of the ring. The whole fight lasted two seconds.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Yeah. Hey Jerry, listen to this. I discovered something even better than conjugal visit sex. Fugitive sex!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: George, this is a little too much for me - escaped convicts, fugitive sex...I got a cockfight to focus on.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You won't regret this, Miss Benes. What time should I be in? I get up at four, I could be here as early as four twenty-five.
quotes.author: Morty

quotes.quote: The jerk store called, they're running out of you!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: You know, George, the ocean called. They're running out of shrimp.
quotes.author: Riley

quotes.quote: I slipped - and fell in the mud. Ruining the very pants I was about to return.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Oh, I bought a bunch of bunion stories from Newman - but they all stink!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: My whole life I have never made a great entrance.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: That stuff is unbelievable. I'd eat it out of a dumpster.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: These Dominicans really know their way round a crepe. Look at that.It's like they're rolling a double corona.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I love a good nap. Sometimes it's the only thing getting me out of bed in the morning.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Listen to this. Marcy comes over and she tells me that her ex-boyfriend was over late last night and 'yada yada yada I'm really tired today.' You don't think she'd yada yada sex?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Come celebrate the millennium, with Newmanniun. Newman!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: For me, the next millennium must be Jerry-free.
quotes.author: Newman

quotes.quote: You know, if you take everything I've done in my entire life and condense it down into one day, it looks decent.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: When do you start to worry about ear hair?
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Because men think if women are grabbing and clawing at each other, there's a chance they might somehow kiss.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I feel like an out-of-work porn star.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Boy, a month in Europe with Elaine. That guy's coming home in a body bag.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Oh man, I think I cooked myself.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Breaking up is like knocking over a Coke machine. You can't do it in one push. You gotta rock it back and forth a few times, and then it goes over.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: You know, Darren, if you had told me twenty-five years ago that some day I'd be standing here about to solve the world's energy problems, I would've said you were crazy. Now let's push this giant ball of oil out this window.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Serenity now, insanity later.
quotes.author: Lloyd Brawn

quotes.quote: George, letting my emotions out was the best thing I've ever done. Sure, I'm not funny anymore, but there's more to life than making shallow, fairly obvious observations.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: Food and sex. Those are my two passions. It's only natural to combine them.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go fill my freezer with my own blood.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I can feel his blood inside of me. Borrowing things from my blood.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: No Chinese leftovers. George is gettin' suspicious.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Wait a minute. You mean to say that you drugged a woman so you could take advantage of her toys?
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I haven't had a decent sandwich in thirteen years.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: I've cut slices so thin, I couldn't even see them.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: You can stuff your sorries in a sack, mister!
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Why not? We're neighbors. What's mine is yours.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: But the thing you don't realize is that there's good naked and bad naked. Naked hair brushing - good. Naked crouching - bad.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: The female body is a work of art. The male body is utilitarian. It's for gettin' around. It's like a Jeep.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: At the Festivus dinner, you gather your family around and tell them all the ways they have disappointed you over the past year.
quotes.author: Frank Costanza

quotes.quote: It was destroyed. But out of that a new holiday was born... A Festivus for the rest of us!
quotes.author: Frank Costanza

quotes.quote: Stop crying and fight your father!
quotes.author: Frank Costanza

quotes.quote: Slapping hands is the lowest form of primate ritual.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I think I've reached a point in my life where I can tell the difference between nougat and cookie.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Nobody carries wallets anymore. They went out with powdered wigs.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Hey Silvio, look at Jerry here, prancing around in his coat with his purse. Yup, he's a dandy. He's a real fancy boy!
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: She does stink. And she should quit. But I don't want it to be because of me. It should be the traditional route. Years of rejection and failure until she's spit out the bottom of the porn industry.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: What do I need to talk for, huh? What, to blab to the neighbors about how George has a new femme Jerry friend? To tell everybody at the coffee shop how George is all mixed up in a perverse sexual amalgam of some girl and his best friend? See now, I've done all that. Now it's time for silence.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Man's Best Friend... Jerry, I want something like that on my tombstone.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Kramer, you can't live down here. This is where people come to die.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: I've been lying about my income for a few years. I figured I could afford a fake house in the Hamptons.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: "Pull the old switcheroo." "I think that's 'What's good for the goose is good for the gander.'" "What the hell is a gander anyway?" "It's a goose that's had the old switcheroo pulled on her."
quotes.author: Jerry and George

quotes.quote: I'm going to make people feel my gonnorhea.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: If it wasn't for the toilet, there would be no books.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: We should've got some collateral from him. Like his bag of cans. Or his... other bag of cans.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: What is nice? Trying to fill the void in your life with flour and sugar and egg and vanilla? I mean, we are all unhappy. Do we have to be fat too?
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: Kramer, listen to me. I'm never going to have a child. If I lose this Frogger high score, that's it for me.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: She's a sentence finisher. It's like dating Mad Libs.
quotes.author: Jerry

quotes.quote: There's nothing more sophisticated than diddling the maid and then chewing some gum.
quotes.author: Elaine

quotes.quote: You've got insurance. You tell them that the car was stolen, and then you get another one free.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Uh, yes, most likely, yes. I'm, uh, H.E. Pennypacker. I'm a wealthy industrialist and philanthropist and, uh, a bicyclist. And, um, yes, I'm looking for a place where I can settle down with my, uh, peculiar habits, and, uh, the women that I frequent with.
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Why would we want to help somebody? That's what nuns and Red Cross workers are for.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: But they did not care. They're totally indifferent. All they do is mock me, just like they did the fat fellow. All the time, mocking, mocking, mocking, mocking, all the time. It is Babu's turn to mock.
quotes.author: George

quotes.quote: Jerry, it's L.A.! Nobody leaves. She's a seductress, she's a siren, she's a virgin, she's a whore!
quotes.author: Kramer

quotes.quote: Hear me, and hear me well. The day will come. Oh yes! Mark my words, Seinfeld. Your day of reckoning is coming, when an evil wind will blow through your little play world and wipe that smug smile off your face. And I'll be there, in all my glory, watching, watching as it all comes crumbling down.
quotes.author: Newman
